_description: On Cato, pagan yet Christian — five tail-rhyme stanzas of 6 short lines

BodFair14.First Lines:
Curtaise catounþus endis his resounof mannis
                    manere…
BodFair14.Note:
At the end: ‘Stokynbrig scripsit istum librum willelmo keruour
                        de lancastria’.
BodFair14.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James. 
             “How Cato was a Paynym and a Christian too.” 
             Notes and Queries
         4th ser. 2 (1868): 176.
